price: Hakika Mungu wenu bila ya shaka ni Mmoja.
footnotes: Hakika Mungu wenu anaye faa kuabudiwa bila ya shaka ni Mmoja tu. Hana mshirika wake, kwa dhati, wala kitendo, wala sifa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
